page.title: 09Gorran - Adult Associations
page.content: Gorran & District Residents Association was formed in 1969 to fight the China Clay Company's plan to pump 4,000,000 tons of clay waste annually into the sea off Gorran Haven.The Association succeeded in preventing the pollution of the coast line and beautiful beaches.There are now 85 members who meet each month and work to protect the needs of the area. The local school has a Friends of the School Association, formed in 1976, organising many social and fund raising events to provide much needed extras - computers,musical instruments books etc. - for the 103 pupils of the school.A Committee of 10 elected parent representatives are responsible for providing this valuable service to the school and the village community.
